recipe.preparation: Put water and sugar in saucepan. Bring to boil, stirring constantly. Slice fruit thinly and put in sugar water.  Let stand at room temperature at least 2 hours.  Place in punch bowl or pitcher, reserving one slice of each fruit for each glass.  Add other ingredients; sparkling water last.  You may chill or add ice.  For a sweeter taste, add ginger ale, Sprite or 7-up with or instead of club soda.  Also, try orange juice and/or lemonade.
recipe.name: Sangria
recipe.source_name: "Family Favorites", The Epiphany School Lady's Guild, Linda Desimone presiding.  Recipe by Vicki Susoev.
recipe.notes: Dennis's wife Maureen makes some of the BEST sangria on the planet and I've yet to really want to go finding  an alternate recipe just yet.  Since I don't have that one just yet, this'll hafta do...
